name: Sai Serenity
description:
In this game you get to peacefully knock around boxes with a pair of sai.

Libraries
Make sure you have glfw, bullet physics,  ffmpeg, libpng, and opengl graphics drivers.

Bugs
The Sai's position will be a little glitchy. It tries to resync with your controllers periodically to help combat drift. Make sure you have both controllers on before you start the game.

Credits:
BGM: cynicmusic
Skybox: Luke.RUSTLTD
